resources.string: Warning: turning beta features on could cause crashes in the app
The handicap system was changed for the 2023 season to use a new formula from Archery GB. Prior to this, tables created by David Lane were used. Use this toggle to switch between the two systems.

There are some app features that may not be fully completed or tested. They may be unintuitive, less aesthetic, or unstable. Turn this on to see them anyway (note: this may cause unexpected behaviour within the app and could lead to crashes)
